DOC.detailed_description: Mushrooms capability produce vitamin D similar way human skin . When exposed ultraviolet light , mushroom convert precursor vitamin D. This reaction produce large amount vitamin D. This study compare natural source vitamin D synthetic source vitamin D help determine mushroom novel source essential nutrient .
